abstract: New York State Supreme Court Judge Peter H Moulton rules leadership team meetings at New York City public schools must be open to general public.
lead_paragraph: Every public school in New York City is required to have a School Leadership Team, made up of a mix of faculty and parents, including the principal and the chapter leader of the teachers’ union.

headline.main: School Leadership Meetings Are Open to the Public, Judge Says

snippet: Every public school in New York City is required to have a School Leadership Team, made up of a mix of faculty and parents, including the principal and the chapter leader of the teachers’ union.
